title: Season 5 Diamond/OCS Support LF ADC duo for Season 6.
body:
Title says it. LF Dia+ adc for dyna Q to climb to chall with.

Peaked D2 last season and played in OCS/Challenger Scene as a support. Looking for someone around the same skill level.

Just played placements, let's climb. 

Add me in-game: Makkamiks | or comment below (changing IGN soon) and i'll add you.

replies.body: Hi there, I do not mind doing a dynamic queue with you though I am still a university student and work at the same time. My ID for in-game is just as you can see it and if you would like to play or practice with me, even teaching me the ropes or a few pointers I do not mind at all! I now use discord as Skype has been laggy and disappointing on its updates. Thank you!
